text: Penny Stocks Alerts for Aqua Power Systems, NuGene, Creative Edge Nutrition, EKSO BIONICS, GT Advanced Technologies, and Portlogic Systems » Science & Technology Published on 2015-09-25 07:31:28 Penny Stocks Alerts for Aqua Power Systems, NuGene, Creative Edge Nutrition, EKSO BIONICS,... -- PHOENIX  <- stripped tags ->   PHOENIX   Pennystocksinsiders.com (PSI) released FREE insider trading reports for US market investors to track the following active stocks and [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWNHVnVibmx6ZEc5amEzTnBibk5wWkdWeWN5NWpiMjB2WENJZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCMFlYSm5aWFE5WENKZllteGhibXRjSWo1d1pXNXVlU0J6ZEc5amEzTThMMkUrfA==]]: Aqua Power Systems (OTCBB:APSI), NuGene (OTCBB:NUGN), Creative Edge Nutrition (OTCMKTS:FITX), EKSO BIONICS (OTCBB:EKSO), GT Advanced Technologies (OTCMKTS:GTATQ), and Portlogic Systems (OTCMKTS:PGSY). (Read full report by clicking the link below, you may need to copy and paste the full link to your browser.) Report Highlights: Aqua Power Systems Inc (OTCBB:APSI): By the end of last trading, the Aqua Power Systems (OTCBB:APSI) shares plunged 34.44% (or US$0.0310 ) to US$0.0590 with about 7.60 million shares exchanged hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 0.158 million shares. In 2012 the company was called NC Solar Inc and was trying to go public. Some shareholders agreed to sell 1,451,318 shares at a price of US$0.15 apiece or a grand total of US$217,703 . After the 18 for 1 forward split from last year, the 1,451,318 shares offered to the public were transformed into 26,124,318 shares of common stock. After the pump a few days ago, the tumble has taken the ticker lower than anyone expected faster than anyone anticipated. Is this company running promotion by penny stock promotor? Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report Mere. Read Full Report: [[]] NuGene International Inc (OTCBB:NUGN): By the end of last trading, the NuGene (OTCBB:NUGN) shares slid 0.62% (or US$0.01 ) to US$1.61 with about 0.153 million shares exchanged hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 0.165 million shares. According to its latest quarterly report, the company's revenues for the quarter grew by 153% compared to the same period last year, but the US$15,500 net income has turned into a nearly US$800 thousand net loss. Early this month, the company issued its latest press release but only managed to push the stock 3.59% in the green. The company announced that it had signed a memorandum of understanding with Bassett Salon Solutions, a distributor of high-end beauty products to over 7,000 salon accounts in the United States . With the plan by Q1 2016, its products will be distributed to all of Bassett's accounts. Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report here. Read Full Report: [[]] Creative Edge Nutrition Inc (OTCMKTS:FITX): By the end of last trading, the Creative Edge Nutrition (OTCMKTS:FITX) shares soared 39.53% (or US$0.00170 ) to US$0.00600 with about 103.42 million shares exchanged hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 9.13 million shares. The company announced the successful spinoff of CEN Biotech Inc. The new entity's president and CEO will be none other than former CEO Bill Chaaban . The investors rushed it again once they heard the news that the company has finally made its fabled spin-off happen. Is this company running promotion by penny stock promotor? Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report here.
